amendment.description: Amendment requires any new escalator being installed in Federal buildings to be an intermittent escalator.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 109-49 require any escalator being installed in federal buildings to be an Intermittent Escalator. In addition, federal agencies would also be encouraged to incorporate other escalator energy conservation measures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
